channel.title: New Xenia Artwork
channel.description: You guys like Xenia? Thought so...

item.title: 2023-08-30: The software developer furries, featuring Freya the deer and Xenia the Linux mascot.
item.description:
What a day for Xenia fans, huh? Jimmy Jimmy, who's WIP you would have seen on the 26th, has now made a full-color version of the Xenia art!

https://twitter.com/JimmyJimmyArt/status/1696994561992581581

item.title: 2023-08-30: I blame peer pressure for drawing this one
item.description:
RiniDisc, who published Xenia art not so long ago, has made more art of the Linux foxgirl!

https://meow.social/@rinidisc/110979898103918263

https://twitter.com/RiniDisc/status/1696947894652158065

item.title: 2023-08-30: Me and Xenia spending some quality time together.
item.description:
RiniDisc, whose art you would have been here before, has made more Xenia art, this time with her owl OC!

https://meow.social/@rinidisc/110975427064987013

https://twitter.com/RiniDisc/status/1696661679377887352

item.title: 2023-08-29: Xenia Puppet
item.description:
Wolfs Prop Creations, who was commissioned by nickisdoge, has made a Xenia puppet - very cool and now I want to have my own Xenia puppet IRL.

https://furaffinity.net/view/53474155/

https://furaffinity.net/view/53474137/

https://furaffinity.net/view/53474120/

Update: The images have since been posted on Twitter and Masto by nickisdoge:

https://meow.social/@nickisdoge/110973136617818577

https://twitter.com/nickisdoge/status/1696511651116204525

item.title: 2023-08-26: happy birthday, Linux! have a Xenia!
item.description:
Due to Linux now being 32 years old (as of the 25th), Jimmy Jimmy drew Xenia, here she is!

https://twitter.com/JimmyJimmyArt/status/1695415279432442096

https://www.tumblr.com/jimmyzedart/726719377164156928
